alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Golden Valley; Livingston Area; Melville Foothills; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass; Paradise Valley; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 02 at 3:10PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Showers with strong, gusty winds will impact portions of north central Stillwater, southeastern Wheatland, southwestern Golden Valley, central Sweet Grass and central Park Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 307 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers with strong, gusty winds along a line extending from 15 miles northeast of Big Timber to 18 miles north of Gardiner. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 60 mph. SOURCE...Radar and observation indicated. Livingston reported a gust to 57 mph with the showers at 245 pm MDT. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Big Timber, Chico Hot Springs, Pine Creek, Springdale, Chico, Greycliff, Mc Leod and Emigrant. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
